name: .VIOLENCE
description:
Its the middle of the night. Armed with only an inconsistent SMG, a very trusty shotgun, and a reliable revolver. Can you haunt your friends in the darkness? Or will you be jumping out of your chair?

A multiplayer game I made in a few days. I was really annoyed at there being (in my opinion) no good multiplayer shooters nowadays. My friends would only really play VALORANT and I was getting real tired of the defuse shooter. So I made my own to distract my friends for a bit, and to practice my development skills.

CONTROLS:

1, 2, 3 - Switch weapons,

F - Flashlight, 

Right click - Toss a flare

NOTES:

This game has issues, and I will not be fixing them in the future.

Most music and sounds do not belong to me.

All music is from the Midnight Fight Express OST.
